name: simplified-oshdb-api-programming
description: a simplified language for the oshdb api

scripts.build: npm run cleanup && mkdir build && mkdir dist && nearleyc soap-grammar/soap-grammar.ne -o build/soap-grammar.js && cp soap-to-java/soap-to-measure.js build/ && babel --presets babel-preset-es2015 --out-dir dist/ build/

author: Franz-Benjamin Mocnik <mocnik@uni-heidelberg.de>
